house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1971 has 3 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 1794 square feet of living area. Rooms include den, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include private spa, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Century 21 1St Choice Realty Century 21 1St Choice Realty

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Den, Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
